title: Kami no Techigai de Shindara Zumi de Isekai ni Hourikomare Mashita - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adult   Adventure   Comedy   Ecchi   Fantasy   Harem   Romance
tags: Adapted to Manga   Childhood Friends   Demons   Dragons   Early Romance   Elves   First-time Interc**rse   F*llatio   Gods   Harem-seeking Protagonist   Loli   Male Protagonist   Polygamy   R-18   Reincarnated in Another World   Royalty   S*aves
author: Kakurou   かくろう
description:
Tomoya Sadoshima died after a serious accident due to the mismanagment of a Goddess. 

Then, after regaining consciousness in a pure white world, a woman of divine beauty emerged, she introduces herself as 'The Goddess of Creation.' 
The goddess of creation prepared a remedy for his suffering, she offers him to reincarnate into a different world than his own. 
But it was a world in a war situation with the demon king. 

And so begins the story of Tomoya and his adventure to defeat the demon king and get the harem he so desires!>
